channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Italian winemakers are fighting to banish ‘prosecco’ from your wine collection
item.description: Prosecco is one of the most consumed sparkling wines in the world, but some producers feel the name has become a hindrance.

item.title: HelloFresh shares pop 11% as meal kit giant beats profit estimates
item.description: HelloFresh said it got a boost from healthy growth in its ready-to-eat meal delivery business.

item.title: Home Depot’s stock drops as earnings beat, but sales missed, outlook cut
Billionaire Sir Jim Ratcliffe says he doesn’t wear a watch in London anymore amid Rolex mugging surge
item.description: The Manchester United minority owner has stopped flaunting his watches in London after 6,800 were stolen in the capital last year.

item.title: Home Depot expects sales to weaken as consumers grow more cautious
item.description: Home Depot's CFO said homeowners are now deferring projects due to a "sense of greater uncertainty in the economy."

item.title: The Nikkei 225 has now completely recovered from last Monday's crash
Why The New York Times, Washington Post, and Politico won’t print leaked emails from the Trump camp
item.description: The emails from a person identified as “Robert” include a 271-page campaign document about JD Vance and a partial vetting report on Sen. Marco Rubio.

item.title: The big ‘carry trade’ unwind is far from over, strategists warn
item.description: Strategists have warned it is too early to give the all-clear to the rapid unravelling of "carry trades."

item.title: Trump praises Tesla, worries about how much power AI uses in chat with Musk
This sleepy town in the Czech Republic known for its sweet pies and wooden houses just got $2 billion to help Europe compete in the global chip war
item.description: U.S. chipmaker Onsemi picked Roznov for a new $2 billion manufacturing hub in June. A contract with Volkswagen is already lined up.

item.title: Analyst calls: Warner Bros. Discovery gets a downgrade, cybersecurity stock a buy ahead of earnings
item.description: A media giant and a cybersecurity company were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Tuesday.

item.title: Harris, like Trump, wants no taxes on tips. Critics say the idea is ‘very silly'
Mercedes-Benz reveals EV battery maker names after South Korea car explosion prompted parking garage bans
item.description: The August 1 fire damaged hundreds of vehicles and created a national panic, with car parks across South Korea imposing a wave of adhoc restrictions amid growing calls for transparency on battery supply chains.

item.title: Auctions of early King Charles bank notes raise $1.17 billion for charity
item.description: Auctions of King Charles III bank notes with low serial numbers have raised £914,127 for charity, according to the Bank of England.

item.title: Here's what investors will be looking for in Kamala Harris's economic platform
